name: LadyDoom
description:
/!\  YOU HAVE TO CLICK ON THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON FOR THE GAME TO WORK /!\

[This game was made for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam]

As a ladybug, struggle for your life in an infested tomatoes culture. Dodge pesticide drops and gather aphids that swarm on leaves to better crush them. 

We were three to work on this game jam. That was our first one and it was pretty funny ! Our main inspirations were (obviously, we hope) : Doom and Among Us.

 Controls : - WASD to naviguate - Maintain J to catch - Spam K to kill

Music credits :

 - DavidKBD - Eternity Pack - 06 - God of darkness

 - DavidKBD - Eternity Pack - 09 - Soul evisceration 

Sound effects : 

-  Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
